comments.en:
Works fine, although I have only tried it up to 600x600dpi on A4.
Comes with 4MB of RAM; more memory is probably needed for 1200dpi output.
I have no confirmed report as yet of 1200dpi working, but given enough memory it ought to.

I have tested an LBP-1000 which does 1200dpi with the ljet4, lj5gray, and the pxlmono drivers. With enough memory the LBP-1760 probably does it, too.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Cartridge. Price about 99 Irish Pounds
